Equipment Actions.Action 1: Claws, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 8 Slashing.  The Vampire Spawn can grapple instead of dealing damage
Equipment Actions.Action 2: Bite, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 6 Piercing plus 7 Necrotic.  The target's maximum health is reduced by the Necrotic damage and the Vampire Spawn heals

Other Actions.Action 1: Multiattack, The Vampire Spawn makes 2 attacks, only one of which can be a Bite

Abilities.Ability 1: Regeneration, The Vampire Spawn regains its health every turn.  It is said Radiant damage and Holy Water can prevent a Vampire from healing
Abilities.Ability 2: Spider Climb, The Vampire Spawn can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check
Abilities.Ability 3: Vampire Weaknesses, These are mostly from folk tales and should be taken with a grain of salt.  Forbiddance, A vampire can not enter a residence without invitation from an occupant.  Harmed by Running Water, The vampire is affected by running water as if it were acid.  Stake to the Heart, If a piercing weapon made of wood is driven into the vampire's heart while it is resting, it becomes paralyzed.  Sunlight Hypersensitivity, A vampire takes Radiant damage from sunlight, as well as disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks

Damage Resistances.Damage 2: Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing from nonmagical attacks
